markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6+"
    pfs=""
>
[Wand of Teeming Ghosts](/Equipment.aspx?ID=795)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from The Slithering</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
<trait label="Wand" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=164" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [The Slithering](/Sources.aspx?ID=41) pg. 61, [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 142 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This pale wooden wand is carved to resemble a thigh bone with metal caps at each end. Ghostly tendrils seem to swirl around it every so often.

**Activate** <actions string="" /> Cast a Spell;  **Frequency** once per day, plus overcharge;   **Effect** You cast [_false life_](/Spells.aspx?ID=108) of the indicated level. During the duration of the spell, wisps that resemble spirits flit around you as long as you have any temporary Hit Points from false life, and you can use the following action.

**Activate** <actions string="Free Action" /> envision;   **Trigger** You successfully impart the [frightened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) condition to a creature; **Requirements** You have temporary Hit Points; **Effect** You end [_false life_](/Spells.aspx?ID=108) and increase the creature's frightened condition value to 2. 

**Craft Requirements** Supply a casting of [_false life_](/Spells.aspx?ID=108) of the appropriate level.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
